00045 void CModel::LoadModel(char * fname){
00046   int i;
00047   double x,y,z;
00048   char buffer[30];
00049   FILE *fp1 = fopen(fname,"r");
00050 
00051   gettoken(buffer, fp1);
00052   gettoken(buffer, fp1);  p_no = atoi(buffer);
00053   gettoken(buffer, fp1);  f_no = atoi(buffer);
00054   gettoken(buffer, fp1);
00055   if(plist!=NULL) delete [] plist;
00056   if(flist!=NULL) delete [] flist;
00057   plist = new Point_3[p_no];
00058   flist = new int[3*f_no];
00059 
00060   for(i = 0; i < p_no; i++){
00061     gettoken(buffer, fp1); x = atof(buffer);
00062     gettoken(buffer, fp1); y = atof(buffer);
00063     gettoken(buffer, fp1); z = atof(buffer);
00064     plist[i] = Point_3(x,y,z);
00065   }
00066   for(i = 0; i < f_no; i++){
00067     gettoken(buffer, fp1); // read the number 3
00068     gettoken(buffer, fp1); flist[3*i+0] = atoi(buffer);
00069     gettoken(buffer, fp1); flist[3*i+1] = atoi(buffer);
00070     gettoken(buffer, fp1); flist[3*i+2] = atoi(buffer);
00071   }
00072 }
00073 
00074 void CModel::SaveModel(char *fname){
00075   FILE *fp1 = fopen(fname,"w");
00076   fprintf(fp1, "OFF \n%d %d 0 \n", p_no, f_no);
00077   for(int i=0; i<p_no; i++)
00078     fprintf(fp1, "%f %f %f\n", plist[i].x(),plist[i].y(),plist[i].z());
00079   for(int i=0; i<f_no; i++)
00080     fprintf(fp1, "3 %d %d %d\n", flist[3*i+0],flist[3*i+1],flist[3*i+2]);
00081   fclose(fp1);
00082 }
00083 
00084 void CModel::FacetHarmonics(int fh, int bw, double r, gsl_complex *coeff){
00085   int i, j, sign;
00086   gsl_complex err;
00087   
00088   Triangle_3 tr;
00089   tr = Triangle_3(plist[flist[fh*3+0]],plist[flist[fh*3+1]],plist[flist[fh*3+2]]);
00090   Tetrahedron_3 tetr;
00091   tetr = Tetrahedron_3(Point_3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0),plist[flist[fh*3+0]],plist[flist[fh*3+1]],plist[flist[fh*3+2]]);
00092   if(tetr.is_degenerate()) return;
00093   sign = (tetr.volume()<0 ? -1 : 1);
00094   
00095   for(i=0; i<bw; i++){
00096     for(j=0; j<=i; j++){
00097       Integrate(i, j, r, tetr, &coeff[i*bw+j], &err);
00098       coeff[i*bw+j] = gsl_complex_mul_real(coeff[i*bw+j], (double)sign);
00099     }
00100   }
00101 }
00102 
00103 void CModel::AllFacetHarmonics(int bw, double r, gsl_complex *coeff){
00104   for(int i=0; i<bw*bw; i++) GSL_SET_COMPLEX(&coeff[i], 0.0, 0.0);
00105   
00106   gsl_complex *temp = new gsl_complex[bw*bw];
00107   
00108   for(int i=0; i<f_no; i++){
00109     FacetHarmonics(i, bw, r, temp);
00110     for(int j=0; j<bw*bw; j++) coeff[j] = gsl_complex_add(coeff[j],temp[j]);
00111   }
00112         
00113   delete [] temp;
00114 }
00115 
00116 void CModel::Normalize(){
00117   double xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin, zmax, zmin;
00118   double x, y, z;
00119   double xcentre = 0.0, ycentre = 0.0, zcentre = 0.0;
00120   double scale = 0.0;
00121 
00122   xmax = plist[0].x();  xmin = plist[0].x();
00123   ymax = plist[0].y();  ymin = plist[0].y();
00124   zmax = plist[0].z();  zmin = plist[0].z();
00125 
00126   for(int i =0; i < p_no; ++i){
00127     xcentre += plist[i].x(); ycentre += plist[i].y(); zcentre += plist[i].z();
00128     if(xmax < plist[i].x()) xmax = plist[i].x();     if(xmin > plist[i].x()) xmin = plist[i].x();
00129     if(ymax < plist[i].y()) ymax = plist[i].y();     if(ymin > plist[i].y()) ymin = plist[i].y();
00130     if(zmax < plist[i].z()) zmax = plist[i].z();     if(zmin > plist[i].z()) zmin = plist[i].z();
00131   }
00132 
00133   xcentre /= p_no;  ycentre /= p_no;  zcentre /= p_no;
00134 
00135   if(scale<fabs(xmax-xmin)) scale = fabs(xmax-xmin);
00136   if(scale<fabs(ymax-ymin)) scale = fabs(ymax-ymin);
00137   if(scale<fabs(zmax-zmin)) scale = fabs(zmax-zmin);
00138   scale = 2.0/scale;
00139   
00140   for(int i =0; i < p_no; ++i){
00141     plist[i] = Point_3(plist[i].x()-xcentre, plist[i].y()-ycentre, plist[i].z()-zcentre);
00142     x = plist[i].x()*scale ;
00143     y = plist[i].y()*scale ;
00144     z = plist[i].z()*scale ;
00145     plist[i] = Point_3(x, y, z);
00146   }
00147 }
